typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		{Move Minutes count} as string,
		{Calories (kcal)} as string,
		{Distance (m)} as string,
		{Heart Points} as string,
		{Heart Minutes} as string,
		{Average heart rate (bpm)} as string,
		{Max heart rate (bpm)} as string,
		{Min heart rate (bpm)} as string,
		{Low latitude (deg)} as string,
		{Low longitude (deg)} as string,
		{High latitude (deg)} as string,
		{High longitude (deg)} as string,
		{Average speed (m/s)} as string,
		{Max speed (m/s)} as string,
		{Min speed (m/s)} as string,
		{Step count} as string,
		{Average weight (kg)} as string,
		{Max weight (kg)} as string,
		{Min weight (kg)} as string,
		{Biking duration (ms)} as string,
		{Inactive duration (ms)} as string,
		{Walking duration (ms)} as string,
		{Running duration (ms)} as string,
		{Aerobics duration (ms)} as string,
		{Basketball duration (ms)} as string,
		{Circuit training duration (ms)} as string,
		{Treadmill running duration (ms)} as string,
		{Sleep duration (ms)} as string,
		{Strength training duration (ms)} as string,
		{Weight lifting duration (ms)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AnonimizedDataFlow
AnonimizedDataFlow derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Date,
		{Move Minutes count},
		{Calories (kcal)},
		{Distance (m)},
		{Heart Points},
		{Heart Minutes},
		{Average heart rate (bpm)},
		{Max heart rate (bpm)},
		{Min heart rate (bpm)},
		{Low latitude (deg)},
		{Low longitude (deg)},
		{High latitude (deg)},
		{High longitude (deg)},
		{Average speed (m/s)},
		{Max speed (m/s)},
		{Min speed (m/s)},
		{Step count},
		{Average weight (kg)},
		{Max weight (kg)},
		{Min weight (kg)},
		{Biking duration (ms)},
		{Inactive duration (ms)},
		{Walking duration (ms)},
		{Running duration (ms)},
		{Aerobics duration (ms)},
		{Basketball duration (ms)},
		{Circuit training duration (ms)},
		{Treadmill running duration (ms)},
		{Sleep duration (ms)},
		{Strength training duration (ms)},
		{Weight lifting duration (ms)}
	)) ~> sink1
